description: This file defines a class 'ApiConstants' that holds network API constants and endpoint URLs for the application. It primarily contains a single static constant for the API base URL, configurable via environment variables.

classes.name: ApiConstants
classes.description: A class that contains constants related to API endpoints, notably the base URL for network requests.

methods.name: apiBaseUrl
methods.description: A static constant string that holds the base URL for the backend API, configurable through environment variables.
